name: surf
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
flavor_text.platinum: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
